subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant had 24 points and Serge Ibaka added 17 points as the Oklahoma City Thunder snapped the San Antonio Spurs’ 11-game winning streak with a win at home Wednesday night.
snippet: Kevin Durant had 24 points and Serge Ibaka added 17 points as the Oklahoma City Thunder snapped the San Antonio Spurs’ 11-game winning streak with a win at home Wednesday night.
